description: Scrambling blurs the boundaries between hiking, mountaineering and climbing. This was Mammut’s inspiration for developing the Aegility Pro Mid DT. Based on the innovative Mammut 360° Fusn Technology, it consists of just four parts, combining direct damping, secure grip and high comfort in a robust and lightweight shoe. The 360° knitted seamless sock construction adds flexible comfort, reduces pressure points and contains a Mammut DRYtechnology® waterproof membrane. The new sole design is close to the ground for enhanced control and features a Mammut rubber compound, ensuring reliable, wrap-around grip. A shoe for fast ascenders.
name: Mammut Aegility Pro Mid DT - Mens

specs.value: Easy to put on and take off shoe. Can be operating while wearing thick gloves
Efficient, precise speed lace system. Elastic loops hold laces in lace zone
